Title: Sign Here
Plot:
Mr. Van Driessen sends the boys on a petition drive to stop a furrier from coming to town.
videos:
Hall & Oates - "Maneater"
Def Leppard - "Animal"
Huey Lewis & The News - "I Want A New Drug"
The Dead Milkmen - "Smokin' Banana Peels"
Young MC - "Principal's Office"
Red Hot Chili Peppers - "Show Me Your Soul"
